1: Those who trust in and rely on the Lord [with confident expectation] Are like Mount Zion, which cannot be moved but remains forever.
2: As the mountains surround Jerusalem, So the Lord surrounds His people From this time forth and forever.
3: For the scepter of wickedness shall not rest on the land of the righteous, So that the righteous will not reach out their hands to do wrong.
4: Do good, O Lord, to those who are good And to those who are upright in their hearts.
5: But as for those who turn aside to their crooked ways [in unresponsiveness to God], The Lord will lead them away with those who do evil. Peace be upon Israel.
